Emoticon

People say “a picture is worth a thousand words”. EMOTICON is a concept for a conference that explores the visual power of an image. How far can iconography convey messages and meaning? How are icons used socially, in UX/Ui, in language, for accessibility, and so on?
YEAR 2022
